name: tm35
effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.
